"Varuna... Are you alright?": "Don't worry... It's very hard to accept it, but I have no choice. Luther's rage..."
"Harriet's disappearance is kept secret. If we were to reveal this information, our society as we know it will collapse."
"Therefore, the search must be held in secret. Please understand, Guardian."
"Because we saw what happened, we'll have to go at it alone."
"Do you know where he might have taken her?"
"Luther was originally very secretive. Other than Harriet, I don't know where he might have taken her."
"However, traces of where they might be have been found."
"A Devil Castle has been summoned in the mountain range Northeast from the Neo Cuent Capital."
"There was also a report of strange demonic creatures with wings. This is probably..."
"...from the Devil Castle that Luther created while running away."
"I am Harriet's Adjutant. I must return to the throne so people do not realize that Harriet is missing."
